name: Passionate Custard
description:
Passionfruit? In a custard?
You’re god damn right...
This is perfect, it’s thick, buttery and the citrus from the passionfruit cuts through all of that to give a nice tangy but deep, smooth vape. 

There was something itching my brain whilst vaping this, I couldn’t pin point where I tasted this certain combination before, then it clicked... Solero ice cream! Now this isn’t a solero recipe but it will tickle that part of your brain.

This is just a good combination of custard (and sugar cookie 😏) that will surely satisfy you, wether you’re a fruit fanatic or a custard cunt this will probably scratch that itch for you (ok that‘s enough of the itchy scratchy adjectives) 

If you’re sensitive to CAP V1 then give this 2 weeks, which is where it really excels but I’d be lying to you if I told you I didn’t cain this off the shake, infact I had to make another 30ml just for it to reach that 2 week mark. 

Mix it, shake it, vape it.

Sweetener: optional 
Sugar cookie: not optional

If you like this recipe and what I do then rate and review accordingly or I’ll tell you the ending to Netflix’s/BBC’s “The fall”
author: Nickevz

reviews.text:
This is a nice custard base with the passionfruit bringing in a little extra something to the mix. I find the passionfruit present but a little subtle in a good way as it doesnt take anything away from the custard. Seems to feel quite saturated, not in a wicking kind of way but in the mouthfeel. Very nice vape, might remix and increase the passionfruit slightly and see how it goes. 
Thanks Nick 👊
